subject: Ant Test Report accent conversion problems
msgSnippet: Hi there, I m using JUnit 3.8.1 integrated to Ant in order to generate tes report as an HTML page(s) ... I ve failures rising when comparing french lables with
messageBody:
Hi there,
I'm using JUnit 3.8.1 integrated to Ant in order to generate tes
report as an HTML page(s) ...
I've failures rising when comparing french lables with accents.
even if the test is successfull, I've got a failure from Junit
because of the accent conversion :

effectuÃ© expected:<...Ã©> but was:<...é>

could anyone tell me what I can do to avoid failure rising of this
type ...?

Cheers,

NicolaS.
